reuters.title: DATAPRODUCTS <DPC> GETS SIEMENS CONTRACT
reuters.body: Dataproducts Corp said it received a multi-year contract, valued at more than 30 mln dlrs, to supply band printers to <Siemens AG> of West Germany. Siemens will use the printers for office applications and for medium to large mainframes, Dataproducts said. Reuter 
